mapper.select: SELECT WITHDRAW_DATETIME AS withdrawDatetime, REAL_CLASSIFY AS realClassify, REAL_NO AS realNo, ISSUE_ORG AS issueOrg, WITHDRAW_ORG AS withdrawOrg, TX_ID AS txId, PROGRESS_STATUS AS progressStatus, WITHDRAW_EMP_NAME AS withdrawEmpName, TRANSFER_EMP_NAME AS transferEmpName, TAKEOVER_EMP_NAME AS takeoverEmpName, RETURN_EMP_NAME AS returnEmpName, RECEIVE_EMP_NAME AS receiveEmpName, TRANSFER_DATETIME AS transferDatetime, RETURN_DATETIME AS returnDatetime, STORAGE_UNUSL AS storageUnusl FROM ATMS_SLA_G1

SELECT WITHDRAW_DATETIME AS withdrawDatetime, REAL_CLASSIFY AS realClassify, REAL_NO AS realNo, ISSUE_ORG AS issueOrg, WITHDRAW_ORG AS withdrawOrg, TX_ID AS txId, PROGRESS_STATUS AS progressStatus, WITHDRAW_EMP_NAME AS withdrawEmpName, TRANSFER_EMP_NAME AS transferEmpName, TAKEOVER_EMP_NAME AS takeoverEmpName, RETURN_EMP_NAME AS returnEmpName, RECEIVE_EMP_NAME AS receiveEmpName, TRANSFER_DATETIME AS transferDatetime, RETURN_DATETIME AS returnDatetime, STORAGE_UNUSL AS storageUnusl FROM ATMS_SLA_G1 WHERE WITHDRAW_DATETIME = #{withdrawDatetime}, REAL_NO = #{realNo}, TX_ID = #{txId}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_SLA_G1 WHERE WITHDRAW_DATETIME = #{withdrawDatetime}, REAL_NO = #{realNo}, TX_ID = #{txId}

UPDATE ATMS_SLA_G1 SET REAL_CLASSIFY = #{realClassify}, ISSUE_ORG = #{issueOrg}, WITHDRAW_ORG = #{withdrawOrg}, PROGRESS_STATUS = #{progressStatus}, WITHDRAW_EMP_NAME = #{withdrawEmpName}, TRANSFER_EMP_NAME = #{transferEmpName}, TAKEOVER_EMP_NAME = #{takeoverEmpName}, RETURN_EMP_NAME = #{returnEmpName}, RECEIVE_EMP_NAME = #{receiveEmpName}, TRANSFER_DATETIME = #{transferDatetime}, RETURN_DATETIME = #{returnDatetime}, STORAGE_UNUSL = #{storageUnusl} WHERE WITHDRAW_DATETIME = #{withdrawDatetime}, REAL_NO = #{realNo}, TX_ID = #{txId}

INSERT INTO ATMS_SLA_G1 ( WITHDRAW_DATETIME, REAL_CLASSIFY, REAL_NO, ISSUE_ORG, WITHDRAW_ORG, TX_ID, PROGRESS_STATUS, WITHDRAW_EMP_NAME, TRANSFER_EMP_NAME, TAKEOVER_EMP_NAME, RETURN_EMP_NAME, RECEIVE_EMP_NAME, TRANSFER_DATETIME, RETURN_DATETIME, STORAGE_UNUSL ) VALUES ( #{withdrawDatetime}, #{realClassify}, #{realNo}, #{issueOrg}, #{withdrawOrg}, #{txId}, #{progressStatus}, #{withdrawEmpName}, #{transferEmpName}, #{takeoverEmpName}, #{returnEmpName}, #{receiveEmpName}, #{transferDatetime}, #{returnDatetime}, #{storageUnusl} )
